elementSpec.desc: Enthält Elemente, die die Verfügbarkeit eines Textes beschreiben.
Describes the availability of a text.
Contient des éléments qui décrivent la disponibilité d’un texte.

remarks.p: Wir benutzen das Element, um die Informationen zur Lizenzierung anzugeben.

Indicates restrictions on use or disclosure, licensing, etc. We use the tag to mention the institution that provided us with facsimiles. A facsimile can be produced by a third party (rather than the institution where the source is archived). A source may be in the AVN, # but the facsimile was made available or created by the BPUN.
Nous utilisons l’élément pour spécifier les informations de licence.
